reqs:
Pre-reqs: All of BIOL 112, BIOL 121 and one of BIOL 200, BIOL 201, APBI 210, BIOL 210.
**Please meet in FNH 40, unless otherwise directed by your instructor. MCML 342 will be used periodically throughout the term for assigned lab work.**
description: Grapevine genetics, morphology, and physiology and major biological features of other important berry crops for British Columbia such as blueberry, cranberry, and raspberry. Credit will be granted for only one of APBI 442 or PLNT 542.
